headline: Post Holdings Reportedly Working with Investment Bankers to Explore Possible Transaction with Lamb Weston
summary: Post Holdings, Inc. is working with investment bankers to explore a possible transaction with Lamb Weston Holdings, Inc. , a frozen potato products maker facing pressure from an activist investor to...
